item.title: PIMENTA, JOÃO LOURENÇO CASTAGNARI WILLIMANN ; DE OLIVEIRA CAMARGO, MARIANA ; BELO DUARTE, RAFAEL ; DOS SANTOS, ONELIA APARECIDA ANDREO ; DE MATOS JORGE, LUIZ MARIO . Deoxygenation of vegetable oils for the production of renewable diesel: Improved aerogel based catalysts. FUEL, v. 290, p. 119979, 2021.

LOURENÇO CASTAGNARI WILLIMANN PIMENTA, JOÃO ; DE OLIVEIRA CAMARGO, MARIANA ; BELO DUARTE, RAFAEL ; APARECIDA ANDREO DOS SANTOS, ONÉLIA ; MARIO DE MATOS JORGE, LUIZ . A Novel Kinetic Model Applied to Heterogeneous Fatty Acid Deoxygenation. CHEMICAL ENGINEERING SCIENCE, v. 230, p. 116192, 2020.
